mapper.select: select oi.order_id as 'orderId', opd.order_physical_distribution_id as 'orderPhysicalDistributionId', opd.start_position_detail as 'startPositionName', opd.end_position_detail as 'endPositionName', oi.sts as 'orderSts', opd.sts as 'PhySts', c.courier_phone as 'courierPhone', c.courier_name as 'courierName', csc.courier_services_company_name as 'courierServicesName' from order_information oi LEFT JOIN order_physical_distribution opd on opd.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN courier c on opd.courier_id = c.courier_id LEFT JOIN courier_services_company csc on csc.courier_services_company_id = c.courier_services_company_id where 1=1 and oi.order_id = #{orderId}
